home.title: Front-end Developer
home.description: I'm a passionate software developer with 2 years of experience as a Frontend Developer and 1 year of experience as a Backend Developer. I enjoy building modern, user-friendly interfaces and developing reliable, scalable backend systems. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills through real-world projects.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Frontend Web Developer with strong experience in modern frameworks such as React, Next.js, Vue, and Nuxt, focused on building responsive, scalable, and user-friendly interfaces. I have working knowledge of backend development, primarily with NestJS, which allows me to collaborate effectively across the stack and build well-integrated frontend solutions. I specialize in UI development and design systems using Tailwind CSS, Ant Design, and shadcn/ui, and I am comfortable working with PostgreSQL, Docker, Git, and Figma to deliver clean, production-ready applications.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Fully developed and maintained the admin page as well as the entire official website, overseeing all aspects of design, functionality, and performance. Ensured a seamless user experience, optimized code for scalability and maintainability, implemented best practices for security, and collaborated with stakeholders to meet business requirements and continuously improve the platform.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: Worked on both frontend and backend development to build a student portal and supporting admin features using the latest technologies, ensuring scalability, performance, and a smooth user experience. Additionally, led and mentored interns in developing a free tool project under Sala Tech, guiding them through system design, implementation, and best development practices to successfully deliver the project.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Developed a modern single-page web application for TSD using contemporary frontend technologies, delivering a responsive and high-performance digital menu solution for restaurant operations. Implemented interactive UI components, optimized the application for fast load times, ensured cross-device compatibility, and collaborated with stakeholders to meet functional requirements and enhance the overall user experience.

items.name: DevToolbox
items.description: A comprehensive collection of 100+ free, client-side developer tools for formatting, encoding, converting, and analyzing data. Features include JSON/XML formatters, Base64 encoders, hash generators, image compression, PDF tools, and more. All processing happens in the browser - your data never leaves your device.

items.name: Algo Viz
items.description: An interactive algorithm visualization platform designed to help users understand data structures and algorithms through step-by-step animations and visual explanations. I developed this website using Vibe Coding and Client-Side Rendering (CSR), applying modern frontend techniques to create a smooth, responsive, and engaging learning experience for users.

contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to chat, feel free to reach out!
